itunes:title: Joshua 1-8; 23-24 -- Part 1 : Dr. George A. Pierce
title: Joshua 1-8; 23-24 -- Part 1 : Dr. George A. Pierce
description:
How does Joshua leading the children of Israel into the Promised Land remind you of the Savior’s mission? Dr. George Pierce explores the importance of names, the power and faith of Rahab, and the importance of children gaining their own testimonies.

Please rate and review the podcast!

Show Notes (English, French, Spanish, Portuguese): https://followhim.co/old-testament/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel

Thanks to the followHIM team:

Igor Willians: Portuguese Transcripts
